name: Immortals(修仙志)
description: 《Immortals》 is a SLG with fast paced fighting. When the game starts, the hero will appear in a huge maze, and your goal is to find a way out of the maze. The hero will encounter other characters in the maze. They may be enemies or friends. You need to be careful in making judgments.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowS 7/8//10 Processor: core i-3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
